name: BrandFolium Corporation
overview:
BrandFolium connects Brands and their Ambassadors across the Social Web.

It has developed a Social Media Marketing platform dedicated to building, managing and rewarding Brand Advocate groups. Some of its capabilities feature:

  • Real Time Brand Monitoring
  • Sponsored Message Marketplace
  • Collaboration and Communication tools
  • Brand Sentiment Game

milestones.description: BrandFolium launches Navid, an online marketplace for social networking ads at DEMOspring10
